alert.note: Alert for Garza; Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 5:19PM CDT until June 02 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LYNN AND SOUTHWESTERN GARZA COUNTIES... At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Grassland, or 12 miles southwest of Post, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...West Texas Mesonet. At 505 PM CDT, a wind gust of 61 mph was measured by the Graham mesonet. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Post, Grassland, and Justiceburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Texas.
